title: net: Dial connects successfully to unreachable host
body:
What does 'go version' print?
```bash
go version go1.4.2 darwin/amd64
```

What steps reproduce the problem?
http://play.golang.org/p/3Xm-GLcohL

What happened?
returned error is nil when dial any non-existent address.

What should have happened instead?
the error should not be nil.

Please provide any additional information below.
- [exact same issue](https://github.com/golang/go/issues/8276) which is already closed
- running on MacOSX 10.10.2
